summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Social Media Connect feature for ICF Hub platform. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend UI working correctly with all 5 social platform cards, connection/disconnection workflows operational.

minor_bugs.issue: Auto-posted field shows true for unconnected platforms instead of false
minor_bugs.impact: Minor logic inconsistency - doesn't affect functionality but may confuse users about auto-posting status

passed_tests: Backend GET /api/social-accounts returns all 5 platforms with connected/not-connected status
Backend POST /api/social-accounts/connect successfully links platforms with account_name and token
Backend GET /api/social-accounts/status returns only connected platform names
Social Settings page (/social) loads with all 5 platform cards (Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn, X, TikTok)
Clicking CONNECT on platform expands connection form with account name, access token fields
Submitting connection form shows success and updates card to 'Connected' status
DISCONNECT button on connected platform removes connection successfully
Connection summary shows X of 5 platforms connected correctly
Dashboard has Social Accounts tool card with proper navigation
User registration and authentication workflow functional
Platform-specific fields (Page ID for Facebook) working correctly
Connection notifications created when social accounts are connected
Auto-publishing workflow integration with backend APIs
action_item_for_main_agent: Minor fix needed: In publish_scheduled_post endpoint (/api/schedule/{id}/publish), ensure auto_posted field correctly reflects platform connection status (should be false for unconnected platforms)
